name: Trapped In Time (Dark End Studios)
description:
Trapped In Time is, granted not a game we had talked much about before, but was a Game Jam project that we may have missed the deadline on (Oops). We decided to finish it anyways though because it followed our typical type of psychological horror and puzzles. We hope you enjoy it!

EDIT: Discovered that the credits scene auto-closed so it has been fixed to no longer do that. :P
